subtitle: A quick cheatsheet for the modern AI engineer

sections.heading: 1) End-to-end product ownership
bullets: Ship usable products, not just model demos
Turn existing models into reliable software
Own quality, monitoring, and user impact

sections.heading: 2) Full-stack fundamentals
bullets: Comfortable with backend APIs and services
Can work with relational / NoSQL databases

sections.heading: 3) AI system integration
bullets: Design workflows, not only API calls
Handle failures, retries, and rate limits
Manage state and evaluate model outputs

sections.heading: 4) Architecture & software discipline
bullets: Keeps a clear, version-controlled project structure
Builds systems that are maintainable post-handoff

sections.heading: 5) Strong requirement translation
bullets: Turn vague goals into concrete specs
Clarify constraints, success metrics, and edge cases

cta: Bookmark this and focus your 2026 learning roadmap on these 5 skills.
